changes.title: Change Log System
changes.description: Implemented a comprehensive change log system with dashboard button, modal display, and settings management. Users can now track all updates and changes to the marina portal.
changes.impact: Users will see a new 'What's New' button on the dashboard and can access detailed change information through settings.

changes.title: Settings Page Reorganization
changes.description: Restructured the settings page into logical sections for better organization and user experience. Settings are now grouped by functionality.
changes.impact: Settings are now easier to find and navigate, with clear section headers and improved layout.

changes.title: Enhanced Data Source Management
changes.description: Improved the data source toggle system with better state management and user preference storage.
changes.impact: More reliable switching between mock and live data, with persistent user preferences.

changes.title: Authentication Session Handling
changes.description: Fixed issues with user session management and role-based access control across the application.
changes.impact: More reliable user authentication and consistent access to features based on user roles.

changes.title: Enhanced Input Validation
changes.description: Implemented comprehensive Zod schema validation for all forms and user inputs.
changes.impact: Better security and data integrity with proper input sanitization and validation.
